doc.title: Nothing to Nobody
doc.plot: A compelling drama set in the Dominican neighborhoods of upper Manhattan, Nothing to Nobody tells the story of Alfonso Raul, a tortured young man with the soul of a poet. Having served an eighteen-month prison sentence, he is determined to change his destiny, to embrace the omnipotent American Dream and regain his elusive freedom. But can he? Trapped by a dark secret, paralyzed by fear, Alfonso has to rediscover the true meaning of loyalty, family and love, in order to conquer the invisible walls surrounding him. Will he succeed in redeeming himself and catch a glimpse of Freedom? And what will he need to sacrifice? Cleverly constructed like a maze, Nothing to Nobody is an intense and probing drama laced with poetry and haunting images.
